titleStmt.title: An Act for a day of publique thanksgiving to be observed throughout England and Wales, on Thursday on the first of November, 1649. Together with a declaration of the grounds thereof.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Edward Husband, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: 11 Oct. 1649. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
